heading: HB03989
0: AN ACT INSTITUTING BUDGET REFORMS TO ENSURE THE EQUITABLE DISTRIBUTION OF FUNDS TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROMOTING LOCAL EMPOWERMENT, ENABLING THEM TO BE AN EFFECTIVE INSTRUMENT IN ATTAINING INCLUSIVE GROWTH, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
